summary: Forty-something Pascaline runs a restaurant and prepares the stylish dining room for Valentine's Day. How could she expect her lover of twenty years ago to appear and asks her to leave with... See full summary »
cast: Koen De Bouw|Barbara Sarafian|Ruth Becquart|Filip Peeters|Anemone Valcke|Axel Daeseleire|Wouter Hendrickx|Mathijs Scheepers|Zoë Thielemans|Sara de Roo|Brit Van Hoof|Tine Embrechts|Thomas Janssens|Stijn Steyaert|Dirk Vermiert|Tania Cnaepkens|Tom Viaene|Lore Stuyck|Tom Dingenen|Jef Stevens|Ida Dequeecker|Jelle Van Lysebettens|Sarah Maria Luckx|Sam Schürg
title: Brasserie Romantic
